properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters of Swain's Island; Coastal waters of Manua; Coastal waters of Tututila and Aunuu
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 15 at 6:43PM SBT by NWS Pago Pago AS
properties.description:
Gale force winds will continue to impact American Samoa coastal
waters through Monday night, as tropical activity continues
within a very active monsoon trough to the north. Also, seas are
expected to reach up to 20 feet or higher Sunday and Monday,
especially near thunderstorms.

Gale force winds and dangerous seas could capsize or damage
vessels and the frequent showers could reduce visibility.

Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible hazardous
conditions. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

Listen to NOAA Weather Radio for the latest updates.

You may also follow us on Facebook "NWSPagoPago" or our website
at www.weather.gov/ppg.

NWSheadline: A Gale Warning is in effect for American Samoa coastal waters
